snippet: Nairo Quintana, the runner-up in last year’s Tour de France, confirmed himself as cycling’s next star by winning the Giro d’Italia.
abstract: Colombian cyclist Nairo Quintana wins the Giro D'Italia, earning his first Grand Tour victory and confirming himself as cycling's next star; fellow Colombian Rigoberto Uran comes in second.
lead_paragraph: Nairo Quintana, the runner-up in last year’s Tour de France, confirmed himself as cycling’s next star by winning the Giro d’Italia.
